languages.text: "Корабль отравила измена. И, чтобы ее избыть, я, так и быть, потерплю этот уродливый вихрь".
"And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."
languages.original_text: "Корабль отравила измена. И, чтобы ее избыть, я, так и быть, потерплю этот уродливый вихрь".

traits.locale_text: "Treason has poisoned this whole ship. And in the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind."
"Treason has poisoned this whole ship. And in the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind."
"And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."

"And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."

languages.text: "Und Hochverrat hat das ganze verfluchte Schiff vergiftet. Um ihn zu bekämpfen, bemühe ich mich, diesen hässlichen Wirbel zu ignorieren, von dem Ihr sprecht."
languages.original_text: "And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."

traits.locale_text: "Und Hochverrat hat das ganze verfluchte Schiff vergiftet. Um ihn zu bekämpfen, bemühe ich mich, diesen hässlichen Wirbel zu ignorieren, von dem Ihr sprecht."

languages.text: « Et la trahison a empoisonné l'ensemble du vaisseau. Pour y remédier plus efficacement, je m'efforcerai d'ignorer ce méchant tourbillon dont vous parlez. »
languages.original_text: "And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."

traits.locale_text: « Et la trahison a empoisonné l'ensemble du vaisseau. Pour y remédier plus efficacement, je m'efforcerai d'ignorer ce méchant tourbillon dont vous parlez. »

languages.text: «Y la traición consume la nave entera. A fin de ocuparnos del problema, haré lo posible por ignorar el torbellino del que habla».
languages.original_text: "And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."

traits.locale_text: «Y la traición consume la nave entera. A fin de ocuparnos del problema, haré lo posible por ignorar el torbellino del que habla».

languages.text: 「そして反逆は船全体を毒している。それに対処するため、お前の言うこの醜い旋風を無視するよう最善を尽くす」
languages.original_text: "And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."

traits.locale_text: 「そして反逆は船全体を毒している。それに対処するため、お前の言うこの醜い旋風を無視するよう最善を尽くす」

languages.text: “而且叛国的行为已经毒害了整艘旗舰。我准备把注意力放在解决问题上，尽量不去留意你所说的‘丑恶的旋风’。”
languages.original_text: "And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."

traits.locale_text: “而且叛国的行为已经毒害了整艘旗舰。我准备把注意力放在解决问题上，尽量不去留意你所说的‘丑恶的旋风’。”

languages.original_text: "And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."

languages.text: "İhanet de tüm gemiyi zehirlemiş. Bununla başa çıkmak adına bahsini açtığın o nahoş kasırgayı yok saymak için elimden geleni yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "And treason has poisoned the whole damn ship. In the interest of dealing with it, I will try my best to ignore this ugly whirlwind you speak of."
